title: Catalogue, "Exhibition catalogue for Ex Libris 15: Dada & Surrealism", 1986
medium: Lithography and white ink on white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on back cover across the top in white: Ex Libris 15: Dada & Surrealism 
Across the bottom: Ex Libris 160A EAST 70 STREET NEW YORK 10021 (212) 249-2618
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Inside the catalog is text and images relating to 521 items in the exhibition. The cover has a picture framed with a female hand reaching out of the frame. The back cover has the image of a hand holding a pocket watch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Catalogue, "Exhibition catalogue for Ex Libris 15: Dada & Surrealism", 1986.
1986. Lithography and white ink on white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-150.
